title: RACE TRACK detail page Â» RACING EVENTS
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see all RACING EVENTS that took place on each RACE TRACK\
So I can get an impression for the variety of cars that are racing there
description:
* The RACE TRACK detail page contains a section with a list of all connected RACING EVENTS.
* Each RACING EVENT in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each RACING EVENT in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each RACING EVENT in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no RACING EVENT connected to the RACE TRACK then the section is not displayed at all.
